name: Introduction to Rocket Propulsion
description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion and rocket engines.

lessons.name: History of Rocketry
lessons.description: A brief history of rocketry and space exploration.

lessons.name: Rocket Propulsion Fundamentals
lessons.description: Basic principles of rocket propulsion.

lessons.name: Rocket Engine Types
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket engines.

name: Fuel and Combustion
description: Understanding rocket fuel, combustion processes, and efficiency.

lessons.name: Rocket Fuel
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket fuels.

lessons.name: Combustion Processes
lessons.description: Understanding combustion processes and efficiency.

lessons.name: Combustion Instability
lessons.description: Understanding combustion instability and mitigation.

name: Nozzle Design
description: Principles of rocket nozzle design and performance optimization.

lessons.name: Nozzle Design
lessons.description: Overview of different types of rocket nozzles.

lessons.name: Nozzle Performance
lessons.description: Understanding nozzle performance and efficiency.

lessons.name: Nozzle Optimization
lessons.description: Optimizing nozzle design for specific applications.

name: Fundamentals of Aerodynamics
description: Basic aerodynamic concepts and fluid dynamics principles.

lessons.name: Introduction to Aerodynamics
lessons.description: Basic concepts and principles of aerodynamics.

lessons.name: Fluid Dynamics Basics
lessons.description: Fundamental principles of fluid dynamics.

lessons.name: Airfoil Theory
lessons.description: Introduction to airfoil design and characteristics.

name: Subsonic and Supersonic Flow
description: Understanding subsonic and supersonic aerodynamic behaviors.

lessons.name: Subsonic Flow Characteristics
lessons.description: Analysis of subsonic flow behavior.

lessons.name: Supersonic Flow Principles
lessons.description: Introduction to supersonic flow dynamics.

lessons.name: Shock Waves and Expansion Fans
lessons.description: Study of shock waves and expansion fans in supersonic flow.

name: Aerodynamic Heating
description: Study of aerodynamic heating and thermal protection systems.

lessons.name: Principles of Aerodynamic Heating
lessons.description: Understanding the causes and effects of aerodynamic heating.

lessons.name: Thermal Protection Systems
lessons.description: Overview of thermal protection systems for aerospace vehicles.

lessons.name: Heat Transfer in High-Speed Flows
lessons.description: Analysis of heat transfer in high-speed aerodynamic flows.

name: Spacecraft Structural Design
description: Fundamentals of designing spacecraft structures and materials selection.

lessons.name: Introduction to Spacecraft Structures
lessons.description: Overview of spacecraft structural components and design considerations.

lessons.name: Materials for Space Applications
lessons.description: Study of materials suitable for use in space environments.

lessons.name: Structural Analysis Techniques
lessons.description: Methods for analyzing spacecraft structures.

name: Orbital Mechanics
description: Understanding orbital dynamics and mission planning.

lessons.name: Fundamentals of Orbital Mechanics
lessons.description: Basic principles of orbital motion and Kepler's laws.

lessons.name: Orbital Maneuvers and Transfers
lessons.description: Study of various orbital maneuvers and transfer orbits.

lessons.name: Interplanetary Trajectories
lessons.description: Introduction to interplanetary mission design and trajectory planning.

name: Spacecraft Systems Engineering
description: Overview of spacecraft systems and subsystems engineering.

lessons.name: Spacecraft Subsystems Overview
lessons.description: Introduction to various subsystems in a spacecraft.

lessons.name: Power and Thermal Control Systems
lessons.description: Study of power generation, distribution, and thermal management in spacecraft.

lessons.name: Attitude Determination and Control
lessons.description: Principles of spacecraft attitude determination and control systems.

name: Fundamentals of Organic Chemistry
description: Introduction to organic compounds and their properties.

lessons.name: Introduction to Organic Compounds
lessons.description: Overview of organic compound classification and nomenclature.

lessons.name: Stereochemistry
lessons.description: Study of three-dimensional structure of organic molecules.

lessons.name: Organic Reactions Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to common organic reaction mechanisms.

name: Organic Synthesis
description: Techniques and strategies for organic compound synthesis.

lessons.name: Functional Group Transformations
lessons.description: Study of reactions involving various functional groups.

lessons.name: Carbon-Carbon Bond Formation
lessons.description: Techniques for forming carbon-carbon bonds in organic synthesis.

lessons.name: Retrosynthetic Analysis
lessons.description: Introduction to retrosynthetic analysis and synthesis planning.

name: Spectroscopic Methods
description: Application of spectroscopic techniques in organic chemistry.

lessons.name: NMR Spectroscopy
lessons.description: Principles and applications of nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy.

lessons.name: IR and Mass Spectrometry
lessons.description: Introduction to infrared and mass spectrometry techniques.

lessons.name: Spectroscopic Analysis in Practice
lessons.description: Practical applications of spectroscopic methods in structure determination.

name: Coordination Chemistry
description: Study of metal complexes and coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Introduction to Coordination Compounds
lessons.description: Basic concepts and nomenclature of coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Bonding Theories in Coordination Chemistry
lessons.description: Study of various bonding theories for coordination compounds.

lessons.name: Coordination Compound Reactions
lessons.description: Overview of reactions involving coordination compounds.

name: Solid State Chemistry
description: Principles of solid state structures and properties.

lessons.name: Crystal Structures
lessons.description: Introduction to crystal systems and structures.

lessons.name: Solid State Properties
lessons.description: Study of electrical, magnetic, and optical properties of solids.

lessons.name: Solid State Synthesis
lessons.description: Techniques for synthesis and characterization of solid state materials.

name: Bioinorganic Chemistry
description: Study of inorganic elements in biological systems.

lessons.name: Metals in Biology
lessons.description: Overview of the role of metal ions in biological systems.

lessons.name: Metalloproteins
lessons.description: Study of the structure and function of metalloproteins.

lessons.name: Bioinorganic Processes
lessons.description: Analysis of important bioinorganic processes in nature.

name: Chemical Thermodynamics
description: Principles of thermodynamics applied to chemical systems.

lessons.name: Laws of Thermodynamics
lessons.description: Study of the fundamental laws of thermodynamics.

lessons.name: Thermochemistry
lessons.description: Analysis of heat in chemical reactions and processes.

lessons.name: Chemical Equilibrium
lessons.description: Thermodynamic approach to chemical equilibrium.

name: Quantum Chemistry
description: Application of quantum mechanics to chemical systems.

lessons.name: Foundations of Quantum Mechanics
lessons.description: Introduction to basic principles of quantum mechanics.

lessons.name: Quantum Theory of Atoms
lessons.description: Application of quantum mechanics to atomic structure.

lessons.name: Molecular Quantum Mechanics
lessons.description: Quantum mechanical treatment of molecular systems.

name: Chemical Kinetics
description: Study of rates and mechanisms of chemical reactions.

lessons.name: Reaction Rates and Rate Laws
lessons.description: Introduction to reaction kinetics and rate laws.

lessons.name: Reaction Mechanisms
lessons.description: Study of reaction mechanisms and elementary steps.

lessons.name: Catalysis
lessons.description: Principles and applications of catalysis in chemical reactions.

name: Sindarin Language Fundamentals
description: Introduction to the basics of Sindarin, an Elvish language.

lessons.name: Sindarin Phonology
lessons.description: Study of Sindarin sounds and pronunciation.

lessons.name: Sindarin Grammar Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to Sindarin grammar and sentence structure.

lessons.name: Common Sindarin Phrases
lessons.description: Learning and practice of common Sindarin expressions.

name: Quenya Language and Literature
description: Exploration of Quenya, another Elvish language, and its literature.

lessons.name: Quenya Alphabet and Writing System
lessons.description: Study of Quenya script and writing conventions.

lessons.name: Quenya Vocabulary and Grammar
lessons.description: Building Quenya vocabulary and understanding its grammar.

lessons.name: Quenya Poetry and Songs
lessons.description: Analysis of Quenya literature, focusing on poetry and songs.

name: Dwarvish and Black Speech
description: Introduction to Dwarvish (Khuzdul) and the Black Speech of Mordor.

lessons.name: Khuzdul Basics
lessons.description: Introduction to Dwarvish language structure and vocabulary.

lessons.name: Dwarvish Runes and Inscriptions
lessons.description: Study of Dwarvish runic writing system and famous inscriptions.

lessons.name: Black Speech Origins and Usage
lessons.description: Exploration of the Black Speech's creation and its role in Middle-earth.

name: Foundations of Inter-species Diplomacy
description: Introduction to diplomatic principles in Middle-earth's multi-species context.

lessons.name: Historical Alliances in Middle-earth
lessons.description: Overview of significant alliances between different races in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: Cultural Differences and Diplomacy
lessons.description: Understanding and navigating cultural differences in inter-species interactions.

lessons.name: Diplomatic Protocols and Etiquette
lessons.description: Study of diplomatic customs and etiquette among Middle-earth races.

name: Case Studies in Middle-earth Diplomacy
description: Analysis of significant diplomatic events in Middle-earth history.

lessons.name: The Council of Elrond
lessons.description: In-depth study of the Council of Elrond as a model of inter-species diplomacy.

lessons.name: Rohan and Gondor Alliance
lessons.description: Examination of the diplomatic relations between Rohan and Gondor.

lessons.name: Elves and Dwarves: Overcoming Ancient Mistrust
lessons.description: Analysis of diplomatic efforts to improve Elf-Dwarf relations.

name: Conflict Resolution in Middle-earth
description: Strategies and methods for resolving conflicts between different species.

lessons.name: Mediation Techniques
lessons.description: Study of effective mediation strategies in inter-species conflicts.

lessons.name: Negotiation in Times of Crisis
lessons.description: Techniques for successful negotiations during critical situations.

lessons.name: Post-Conflict Reconciliation
lessons.description: Approaches to fostering reconciliation after inter-species conflicts.

name: Fundamentals of Middle-earth Magic
description: Introduction to the nature and principles of magic in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Origins of Magic in Arda
lessons.description: Study of the cosmological origins of magic in Tolkien's universe.

lessons.name: Types of Magic Users
lessons.description: Overview of different magic practitioners: Wizards, Elves, and others.

lessons.name: Limits and Constraints of Magic
lessons.description: Exploration of the boundaries and limitations of magical powers in Middle-earth.

name: Artifacts and Magical Items
description: Study of powerful magical objects in Middle-earth lore.

lessons.name: The Rings of Power
lessons.description: In-depth analysis of the Rings of Power, their creation and effects.

lessons.name: Palantíri and Seeing Stones
lessons.description: Study of the Palantíri, their uses and dangers.

lessons.name: Weapons of Power
lessons.description: Exploration of magical weapons in Middle-earth, such as Glamdring and Sting.

name: Ethics and Philosophy of Magic Use
description: Examination of ethical considerations in the use of magic in Middle-earth.

lessons.name: Responsible Use of Magic
lessons.description: Discussion on the ethical use of magical powers.

lessons.name: Corruption and Magic
lessons.description: Study of the corrupting influence of power and magic.

lessons.name: Balance and Harmony in Magic
lessons.description: Exploration of maintaining balance in the use of magic in Middle-earth.
